overview: Scott and his friend Nick use the occult to bring a doll to life as a joke, not realizing that the doll consumed an evil spirit and is inhabiting others and stealing souls. Scott s wife Stacey is soon put through the nightmarish test of trying to figure out what is real and what is not. Scott is soon possessed and the evil unleashes throughout a world of strange dreamlike atmosphere in a fight to revoke the evil spirit that is trying to take over their world.
title: Demon Dolls
